entities.name: stan shunpike
entities.description: Conductor of the Knight Bus, described as being a few years older than Harry, with large ears and pimples. He is seen catching sight of Harry on the ground.

relationships.description: Stan Shunpike saw Harry sitting on the ground, which prompted him to stop abruptly and approach Harry.
Stan Shunpike spoke to Harry after approaching him, asking what he was doing on the ground.
Harry turned around quickly to stare at the alleyway between the garage and the houses.
